links: Index entries for sequences related to 3x+1 (or Collatz) problem
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1).
formula: a(0) = 15, a(n) = a(n - 1)/2 if a(n - 1) is even or 3a(n - 1) + 1 if a(n - 1) is odd.
example: 15 is odd, so the next term is 3 * 15 + 1 = 46.46 is even, so the next term is 46/2 = 23.
prog: (PARI) a(n)=my(k=15); for(i=1,n,k=if(k%2,k/2,3*k+1)); k \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 04 2015
author: _Jeff Burch_
